data.title: New Packaging and Labeling Resources Available
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The California Department of Public Health (CDPH) has released new resources to assist cannabis manufacturers and other businesses in understanding and evaluating compliance with packaging and labeling requirements. Packaging and Labeling Resources Common Packaging and Labeling Questions: What are the labeling requirements for cannabis and pre-rolls that only contain cannabis? Cannabis (flower and pre-rolls that […]
